annotations.description: In this episode of How to Drink,I’m making a classic cocktail from the 1920’s called a French 75. It’s famous for knocking people off their feet like the art...
annotations.title: French 75 | How to Drink

textContent:
2oz Gin
.5 Gomme Syrup
1oz Lemon Juice

Shake and pour
Top with Champagne and 2 dashes of absinthe

title: French 75
